text: Some winemakers chose not to make wines that were at risk of wildfire smoke taint, but others forged ahead. @Esther_mobley shares her experience tasting smoky wines https://t.co/lI4nxYyuoW

name: sfchronicle
text:
Current ICU capacity for the five California regions outlined in the new stay-at-home order: 
▪️Bay Area: 25.3%
▪️Greater Sacramento: 22.2%
▪️Southern California: 20.6%
▪️San Joaquin Valley: 19.7%
▪️Northern California: 18.6%
https://t.co/tVVbJrdabC

name: sfchronicle
text:
What is the ICU capacity in each region right now?*

Bay Area: 25.3%
Northern California: 18.6%
Greater Sacramento: 22.2%
San Joaquin Valley: 19.7%
Southern California: 20.6%

(*As of Dec. 3, according to the state’s website)
https://t.co/QUwE54Bof7
